Question: This person and his band toured as the opening act for The Monkees in mid-1987 for their second reunion tour of North America.
Hints: In 1983, this person's first self-titled album was released on Scotti Bros.
In 2011, this person completed his thirteenth studio album, titled Alpocalypse, which was released on June 21, 2011.
They used to have a pet poodle, named Bela (pictured atop this person's head on the cover of his album, Poodle Hat).
